name: interbreed
short_description: The intension of the interbreed project is combine some of the promising new technologies (like Grid, noSQL Database Cassandra, OSGI and MapAndReduce)  into one server architecture and ease the development of modern high scalability, high performance applications. The Api based upon easy to use annotationed pojo's to encapsulate the complexity of this modern technologies. The goal is the make programming noSQL, MapAndReduce and DistributedExecution in a high scalar environment as easy as writing total standard JPA,EJB 3.0 applications.
summary: HA Java Server - distributed Execution, noSQL, MapAndReduce and Grid
